column4: how are you connected to your dsl connection wired or wireless
do you know what chipset your ethernet card has
not really i just built this thing and....
generally wired connections tend to just work
yeah i've been using ubuntu for over a year and it always has just worked
with a new motherboard, do i need some drivers or something
you need to find what chip it is and google it
did it work on the live cd ?
darkest_knight: you know i didn't check, i just installed it
it might be worth googling the motherboard and linux and see what comes up, pain but sometimes you get issues
if you get really stuck you can pick up network cards very cheaply or even go for wifi but its unusual to have one that doesnt work at all
